bibl.title: P. Col. VIII 242: Caranis in the Fifth Century.
bibl.note: P. Col. VIII, 242 is a document from very late in the history of Caranis, quite possibly the latest. This letter tells a story of violent resistance by villagers to the sender's attempt to extract tax-money from them and to the police who try to enforce the collection. Revised text, normalized version, translation and notes.
